overview:
BS Business Administration, MBA Financial Engeneering and Project management 10+ years in progressively responsible financial leadership roles, preferably in real start-ups and turn-around.

Development and continuous evaluation of short and long-term strategic financial objectives and recommendations to strategically enhance financial performance and business opportunities. Provide timely and accurate analysis of budgets, financial trends and forecasts. Direct and oversee all aspects of the Finance & Accounting functions of the organization. Evaluates and advises on the impact of long range planning, introduction of new programs/ strategies and regulatory action. Provide executive management with advice on the financial implications of business activities. Manage processes for financial forecasting, budgets and consolidation and reporting to the Company Provide financial statements in accordance to accounting principles to Investors and Shareholders Define the best capital structure (Debt and Equity) Provide leadership on M&A flow (due dilligence, negociation and closing)
